document.full_text: pg&e corp said on thursday chief executive peter darbee will retire from the company at the end of the month and will be succeeded on an interim basis by the california utility's lead director, lee cox.
document.title: pg&e says ceo darbee to retire
lines_and_colors: pg&e corp said on thursday chief executive peter darbee will retire from the company at the end of the month and will be succeeded on an interim basis by the california utility's lead director, lee cox.
